ruling: - This card's effect can be activated during either player's turn.

- This effect can be activated after a Beast-Type monster you control is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, if that monster was face-up and [[Green Baboon, Defender of the Forest]] was in your hand or Graveyard when it was destroyed.
- This effect can be activated during the Damage Step, at the same time as effects like [[Giant Rat]]'s.
- When [[Green Baboon, Defender of the Forest]] is destroyed, you cannot use its effect to Special Summon itself.

- When [[Green Baboon, Defender of the Forest]] and another Beast-Type monster are destroyed at the same time by a card's effect, like [[Lightning Vortex]], you cannot use [[Green Baboon, Defender of the Forest]]'s effect to Special Summon itself.
- You cannot activate this effect when a face-down Beast-Type monster you control is destroyed by a card effect.
- You cannot activate this effect when a Beast-Type monster treated as a Spell Card (such as one equipped to [[Relinquished]] or a "Crystal Beast") is destroyed.
- You can activate this effect when a face-up monster you control that is treated as a Beast-Type monster (due to [[DNA Surgery]], etc.) is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard.
